channel.title: Community Update - Early October '19
channel.description:
The MESG Foundation just reached an important milestone this week after running the first successful tests of our Alphanet. This means the MESG Network is just around the corner! Also, we traveled to Japan for Devcon 5, sharing a booth with partner OmiseGO, and started working with a new partner, Project Hydro. Read on to learn more about what we have been up to:

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/community-update-late-november-19-2/
